text: hey everyone Kristen Sarah here
hopscotch the globe I thought it would
be a great idea to do this type of video
I did it two years ago and I wanted to
do it again because there's so many new
people that are part of the hopscotch
the gold community now over the past two
years and I want to get to know you guys
this channel and hopscotch the globecom
isn't just about me or about SIA it's
about you as well you are what make up
this community you are what make
hopscotch the globe what it is and I
really wanted to get to know you guys on
a more deeper personal level and I want
all of you to get to know each other on
a more personal level we all have one
amazing thing in common and that is our
love for travel but maybe we have other
things are in common but we don't even
know because we don't really know each
other so I thought it would be fun to
ask you some questions and in the
comment section below you can answer
them as in-depth as you'd like you don't
have to answer all questions if you
don't want to either but I thought it
would be a great way for us to get to
know each other at question number one
what is your name do you have any
nicknames that you go by maybe your
friends your family call you something
different and where are you from number
two where is the first place that you
ever traveled to outside of your own
country if you haven't traveled outside
of your country yet where is the first
place that you want to travel number
three where in the world were you when
that travel bug got a hold of you number
four where do you want to travel to next
which three places let's say three
places that you want to travel to next
number five what did you study what are
you studying in college university if
you're in high school what do you want
to study number six if you have a career
already you've established a career in
something what is it let us know a
little bit about what you do number
seven what's something about yourself
that maybe not many people know about
but you want to tell us number eight
if your best friend were to describe you
in three words what would those three
words be number nine if you could change
one thing about this world what would
you change number ten what is your
favorite food in the entire universe and
I'm talking like if someone said to you
you can only eat one type of cuisine for
the rest of your life what type of
cuisine would it be number 11 if you
could do absolutely anything in the
world it could be anything what would
you want to be doing number 12 if you
aren't pursuing that dream that you have
what's stopping you and on the other
hand if you are pursuing your dreams
what's a tip of advice or your number
one tip of advice that you would give to
people that are maybe scared to pursue
their dreams 13 this is a deep one guys
what is your favorite number 14 besides
travel what other things are you into
and last but not least number 15 it's
not so much a question as it is a
suggestion I would love if you scroll
down the comments and pick someone to
read through all of their answers and
reply back to them maybe you have
something in common with them maybe have
a few things in common with somebody
just reply back and start a conversation
with someone else in this community what
I think is really amazing is all of you
watching this video right now are from
so many different places around the
world and we all know we have one thing
in common at least and that is our love
for travel but I think by answering
these questions and reading through
other people's answers we're going to
realize how much more we have in common
and it doesn't matter what culture we
come from or what religion we believe in
we as human beings have so much more in
common and all really want the same
things when it comes down to it so I
think let's start a conversation with
each other no matter where you're from
what race you are what religion you
believe in let's find out the things
that we have in common and go from there
I really hope you enjoyed this video and
you enjoyed answering these
questions and getting to know each other
if you did like this video give it a
nice thumbs up share it with your
friends and family and don't forget to
subscribe if you haven't already and I
will see you later happy travels
